agents

Class SemaphoreManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sajas.core.Agent
      • agents.SemaphoreManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    sajas.core.TimerListener

    public class SemaphoreManager
extends sajas.core.Agent
    Agent that it's responsible to manage the semaphores in an intersection and switch the lights after a certain time.
